title: Update header logo wordmark to new 90s retro neon asset

requirements.summary: Swap the SiteHeader logo to use the new 90s-inspired retro neon OPExpress wordmark asset while keeping header layout/behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The header renders the updated logo wordmark from `frontend/public/assets/generated`.
The updated logo is visually legible and fits within the existing header height constraints (current `h-10 w-auto`).
No other header elements (theme toggle, spacing, container layout) are changed.

file_operations.description: Add the generated 90s retro neon wordmark PNG (transparent background) as a static asset for the header logo.

Modify ONLY the selected header logo element to point `src` to `frontend/public/assets/generated/opexpress-wordmark-v2.dim_1200x300.png` and adjust only -local styling if needed to maintain legibility within the existing `h-10 w-auto` constraint (no other header changes).
